pages.text: $(bold)Gold Pieces$() are a form of currency that has been stamped and approved by the Tradewinds Consortium.$(p)These coins have been minted from a special alloy and are impossible to counterfeit with a crafting table. Unlike emeralds and diamonds, they will not fall in value if new gemstone deposits are discovered.
As such, Gold Pieces make an exceptionally stable medium for regional trade, and are the only currency that will be universally accepted in a $(l:overview/commodity_markets)Commodity Market$().
